p: TNF-α, IL-6, IL-1β, and IL-10 levels from each sample were measured in duplicate with highly sensitive rat Elisa kit according to manufacturer’s instructions (R&D Systems, Minneapolis, MN, USA) [ 49]. Additionally, also the levels of SOD, GSH, and CAT were assayed in blood according to manufacturer’s instructions (Cusabio Biotech Co., Ltd, Wuhan, Hubei, China) [ 50, 51, 52, 53].
